name: Data Scientist / ML Engineer
description:
A deep learning startup providing a solution for a game dev industry whose customers include Tencent, Huawei, HTC, Vodafone, and Wargaming, among many others, is looking for an experienced and creative Data Scientist/ML Engineer

You will be responsible for solving challenging problems in computer vision and computer graphics using machine learning techniques.

In collaboration with the art team, data scientists are constantly improving the quality of automatically generated 3D avatars from a single selfie. You’ll help build the best avatar system for virtual worlds.

Requirements

  • 3+ years of experience as a data scientist, machine learning engineer, or in the related field.
  • You have a strong interest and knowledge in computer vision (not only deep learning) and follow the updates in the field.
  • You are professional with python3, Linux, git.
  • You are fluent with scikit, NumPy, pandas, cv2, onnx, and at least one DL framework (we use mostly PyTorch).
  • You have experience working in a team (we use gitflow, Asana).
  • You have experience developing a product from problem definition to model integration in a production environment.
  • Excellent verbal and written communication skills.

Nice-to-have:

None of this is a requirement, but we would be impressed if you have

  • Experience working with 3D data (meshes, point clouds) using PyTorch3D or another similar framework.
  • Experience writing scripts in Unity, Blender, Unreal Engine.
  • Understanding how 3D models work — UV maps, meshes, normals, LODs, bones, etc

Conditions

  • Competitive cash salary and equity.
  • Unlimited days off and sick days.
  • Work in a remote-first team anywhere in the world.
  • Flexible working hours.
  • Company retreats (when no Covid).
  • Possibility of relocation to Tallin, Estonia.
